entities.name: dolores umbridge
entities.description: Dolores Umbridge is mentioned as having a fire in her office.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as being alive and safe in Grimmauld Place.

entities.name: professor snape
entities.description: Professor Snape is mentioned as growing worried about Sirius's safety.

entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned as having a captive.

entities.description: Remus Lupin is mentioned as being at headquarters when contact was made.

entities.name: grimmauld place
entities.description: Grimmauld Place is mentioned as the location where Sirius is safe.

entities.name: headquarters
entities.description: Headquarters is mentioned as the location where Alastor Moody, Nymphadora Tonks, Kingsley Shacklebolt, and Remus Lupin are located.

relationships.description: Professor Snape grew worried about Sirius's safety.
Dumbledore was due to arrive at headquarters.
Professor Snape intended to search the forest for someone, implying he would be located at headquarters.
Sirius delegated the task of telling Dumbledore what had happened to Kreecher.
Alastor Moody was at headquarters when contact was made.
Nymphadora Tonks was at headquarters when contact was made.
Kingsley Shacklebolt was at headquarters when contact was made.
